Description: Obsolete, use [trigger_random](../trigger_random) with "Unique" flag. Trigger which will pick one of its targets, which has not been triggered by it before, randomly and fire it when triggered.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If set, the trigger_random_unique can be used again after having fired its targets, handling all of them as if not triggered before again.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to pick random target.
